any idea how to get my default resolution to 1400x900 on hp s7712n desktop which has an intel 945GM card, i run intrepid. All I get is 1024x768
you need the 945 resolution package

did you try tab completing?
I did, they are saying tht they removed the 915resolution from intrepid and 945resolution does not exist
not sure, i always buy nvidia for simplicity
what does this mean "Package 915resolution is not available, but is referred to by another package."
use sudo -i instead
you'd need sudo su, but sudo -i is advised
interactive, i'm just passing on what the ops tell folks
you should just sudo each command
id run fluxbox / xfce for lightness, ram is cheap though :)
its a window manager, the default window manager for ubuntu is metacity
the default in kde is kwin
you could install ubuntu, then sudo apt-get install fluxbox and change your session type to fluxbox, same apps, lighter frontend
you will have all the gnome apps, just that you will use them via fluxbox instead of metacity
its the same OS, just different apps installed by default
not much, if anything
